messages.content: ComfyUI-YoloWorld-EfficientSAM is an unofficial implementation of YOLO-World + EfficientSAM and YOLO-World for ComfyUI, which supports efficient object detection and segmentation.
What are the features of ComfyUI-YoloWorld-EfficientSAM V2.0?
ComfyUI-YoloWorld-EfficientSAM V2.0 supports mask separation and extraction, allowing users to select specific masks for individual output. It also supports both images and videos.
Which models are supported by the YOLO-World Model Loader node?
The YOLO-World Model Loader node supports three official models: yolo_world/l, yolo_world/m, and yolo_world/s. It automatically downloads and loads the models.
What is the purpose of the EfficientSAM Model Loader node?
The EfficientSAM Model Loader node is used to load the EfficientSAM model and supports CUDA or CPU.
What are the main parameters of the Yoloworld ESAM node?

The main parameters of the Yoloworld ESAM node include yolo_world_model, esam_model, image, categories, confidence_threshold, iou_threshold, box_thickness, text_thickness, text_scale, with_confidence, with_class_agnostic_nms, with_segmentation, mask_combined, mask_extracted, and mask_extracted_index.
What is the Yoloworld ESAM Detector Provider node?

The Yoloworld ESAM Detector Provider node, provided by ltdrdata, can be used together with Impact-Pack. Its main parameters include yolo_world_model, esam_model, categories, iou_threshold, and with_class_agnostic_nms.

ComfyUI-YoloWorld-EfficientSAM can be installed using the ComfyUI Manager (On the Way) or manually by cloning the repository, installing the requirements, and restarting ComfyUI. Additionally, the efficient_sam_s_cpu.jit and efficient_sam_s_gpu.jit models need to be downloaded.
